entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:02 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
